origination.corpname: Women for Survival of Agriculture in Michigan

did.unittitle:
Women for Survival of Agriculture in Michigan records
1971-1986
did.abstract: Organization of Michigan family farm wives created in 1971. History and general organizational materials; papers relating to the informational unit of the organization, the American Agri-Women, and the national movement of family farm wives; related printed materials; and photographs.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The records were donated by the organization (donor no. 6865).

accruals.p: No further additions to the records are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Women for Survival of Agriculture in Michigan records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: This organization of Michigan family farm wives was created in 1971.

scopecontent.p: The record group consists of historical background and general organizational materials; papers relating to the informational unit of the organization, the American Agri-Women, and the national movement of family farm wives. There are also some related printed materials and photographs.

did.unittitle: Agendas (fragmentary) and State Board minutes, December 9, 1981 and 1984-1985
